TopicTitle: A crewed Titan mission (sorta) based on Stephen Baxter's Titan

Articles.Content:
Pretty much summed up in the title.  This is a sorta-recreation of the mission in Stephen Baxter's Titan novel.  I had to cut many corners in the making of this video, so parts such as the (spoiler alert)

Spoiler

missile impacting a SSME upon ascent

are not included.  Still, IMO this is the best sorta-cinematic I've got so far.

EDIT:  Forgot to add that this was by no means taken in one "sequence."  For example, the shuttle launch is composed of shots from several different launch attempts.

Edited October 28, 2021 by Entropian
